Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

Ring-Amplitude Modulator Filter

Discussion

This filter uses a sine wave to modulate (change) the signal. You can create "robot" type voices or underwater type effects with lots of motion with this filter.

Preferences:

"Ring Mod Freq": Frequency of modulation. Range: 20.0 to 20000.0 Hz.

"Ring Mod Mode": Mode of modulation. Range: 0.0 (in phase) or 1.0 (out of phase).

"Ring Mod Mix": Mix of modulated signal. Range: 0.00 (original - dry) to 1.0 % (full modulation - wet).


Group: Digital Filter Services
Related Sections: Chorus Filter, Flange Filter, Phaser Filter
